content: परिभू {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To defeat, subdue, conquer, overcome; (hence) to surpass, excel; लग्नद्वि फं परिभूय पद्मं <ls>Ku. 7. 16</ls>; <ls>R. 10. 35.</ls> {@--2@} To despise, slight, treat with contempt, disrespect, insult; मा मां महात्मन् परिभ्रः <ls>Bk. 1. 22</ls>; <ls n="Bk.">4. 37.</ls> {@--3@} To injure, destroy, ruin. {@--4@} To afflict, grieve. {@--5@} To humiliate, disgrace. {@--6@} To disappear. {@--7@} <ab>Ved.</ab> To surround, encircle. {@--8@} To go or fly round. {@--9@} To accompany. {@--10@} To take care of. {@--11@} To guide, govern. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To think of, reflect on, meditate, contemplate; <ls>U. 7. 20.</ls> {@--2@} To contain, include. {@--3@} To make known.
